question: Where is Bombay high offshore oilfield located?
option1: Continental shelf of the Arabian Sea
answer: Continental shelf of the Arabian Sea
explanation: Bombay High (now Mumbai High) is an offshore oilfield located in the Arabian Sea, approximately 160km west of the Mumbai coast. It was discovered in 1974. The field started production in 1976 and is operated by Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC).
